inference:
The largest increase in sales occurred between 1996 and 1998, an increase of $0.75 million.
Final Answer: $\boxed{1998}$. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: The chart shows the amounts of sales at the end of each year.  Therefore we're looking for a year on the chart that has the largest difference from the previous year.    Determining the sales that increased the most number of dollars is equivalent to finding the right endpoint of the segment with the steepest slope.  From observation, we can determine that that line corresponds to the year $\boxed{1998}$.
